actions.name: Use
actions.spellArea: several living creatures, no two of which may be more than 30 ft. apart

system.shortDescription: This functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.3ntxp3zun1j9mf0m]{Hypnotism}, except it affects 2 Hit Die of creatures per caster level you have. You can make up to five requests (instead of a single request) to each creature affected by the spell, and the requests can be as long and as complicated as you desire (though they still must be reasonable).
